Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Requires certain non-licensed professionals to disclose information regarding risks
Summary: Requires self-help practitioners to disclose information to clients regarding risks and to produce a risk management plan.
LawCode: Add ยง391-w, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law and the executive law, in relation to requiring certain non-licensed professionals to disclose information regarding risks
